医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
密歇根大学获得疾病预防控制中心拨款建立新中心，以改善公共卫生对疾病爆发的反应密歇根大学是获得疾病控制与预防中心资助的 13 所机构之一，这些机构将成为专注于预测和应对未来疾病爆发的全国中心网络的一部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/UM-receives-CDC-grant-to-built-new-center-to-improve-public-health-response-to-disease-outbreaks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/UM-receives-CDC-grant-to-built-new-center-to-improve-public-health-response-to-disease-outbreaks.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99628886-3349-48f0-a93a-86ef4c10b6f5 Wed, 20 Sep 2023 15:41:38 -0400
阿肯色大学获得 310 万美元 NIH 奖励，用于研究儿科线粒体疾病尤尼斯·肯尼迪·施赖弗国家儿童健康和人类发展研究所向阿肯色大学拨款 310 万美元，用于研究由线粒体突变引起的一系列儿科线粒体疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/University-of-Arkansas-receives-2431-million-NIH-award-to-study-pediatric-mitochondrial-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/University-of-Arkansas-receives-2431-million-NIH-award-to-study-pediatric-mitochondrial-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3033aa1b-3fd6-43a2-9c48-0230ea79dcd9 Wed, 20 Sep 2023 15:29:35 -0400 University of Arkansas receives $3.1 million NIH award to study pediatric mitochondrial disorders
一种预防性艾滋病毒候选疫苗的新试验在美国和南非开始一种预防性艾滋病毒候选疫苗的试验已开始在美国和南非进行招募。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/New-trial-of-a-preventive-HIV-vaccine-candidate-begins-in-the-United-States-and-South-Africa.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/New-trial-of-a-preventive-HIV-vaccine-candidate-begins-in-the-United-States-and-South-Africa.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a22218f-9ee8-4fca-9015-e3c207bd8f60 Wed, 20 Sep 2023 15:20:37 -0400 New trial of a preventive HIV vaccine candidate begins in the United States and South Africa
美国胸科学会与五个新的卫生系统合作以提高疫苗接种率随着今年秋天各城市准备应对流感、COVID-19、肺炎和 RSV 感染的汇集，美国胸科学会宣布，五个新的卫生系统已与该协会合作，以提高疫苗接种率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/American-Thoracic-Society-partners-with- Five-new-health-systems-to-improve-vaccination-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/American-Thoracic-Society-partners-with- Five-new-health-systems-to-improve-vaccination-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9470463c-3761-4c49-a80f-5911186475a6 Wed, 20 Sep 2023 15:09:49 -0400 American Thoracic Society partners with five new health systems to improve vaccination rates
研究强调了这一流行病对患有慢性阻塞性肺病的老年人的心理健康造成的影响《国际慢性阻塞性肺疾病杂志》在线发表的一项新的纵向研究发现，患有 COPD 的老年人在 COVID-19 大流行的早期阶段患抑郁症的风险较高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/Study-highlights-mental-health-toll-of-the-pandemic-on-older-adults-with-COPD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/Study-highlights-mental-health-toll-of-the-pandemic-on-older-adults-with-COPD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f34ea03c-fe27-4297-baca-b60a13d5d97b Wed, 20 Sep 2023 15:00:49 -0400 Study highlights mental health toll of the pandemic on older adults with COPD
创造具有增强免疫记忆的 CAR-T 细胞来对抗癌症在现有的免疫疗法中，使用“CAR-T”细胞被证明对某些血癌极其有效，但只对一半的患者有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/Creating-CAR-T-cells-with-enhanced-immune-memory-to-fight-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/Creating-CAR-T-cells-with-enhanced-immune-memory-to-fight-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41297347-76db-4505-b203-fedcdcb999f5 Wed, 20 Sep 2023 14:49:13 -0400 Creating CAR-T cells with enhanced immune memory to fight cancer
《儿科康复医学杂志》发表脊柱裂研究和护理增刊IOS Press 出版的儿科康复医学杂志 (JPRM) 增刊介绍了 2023 年世界脊柱裂研究和护理大会的摘要概要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/Journal-of-Pediatric-Rehabilitation-Medicine-publishes-supplement-on-spina-bifida-research-and-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/Journal-of-Pediatric-Rehabilitation-Medicine-publishes-supplement-on-spina-bifida-research-and-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ecca1b6-b94b-4109-becc-13d341df9ff2 Wed, 20 Sep 2023 14:36:25 -0400 Journal of Pediatric Rehabilitation Medicine publishes supplement on spina bifida research and care
FAU 拨款 130 万美元，用于改善痴呆症患者及其家人的生活质量佛罗里达大西洋大学 Christine E. Lynn 护理学院的 María de los Ángeles Ortega（DNP、APRN）获得了社区生活管理局 (ACL) 阿尔茨海默氏病计划倡议的一项为期三年、价值 130 万美元的拨款，用于开展一项突破性的研究该项目旨在促进阿尔茨海默病和相关痴呆症 (ADRD) 患者或高危患者及其家庭护理人员的健康公平并提高生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/FAU-awarded-2413-million-grant-to-improve-quality-of-life-for-individuals-with-dementia-and-their-families。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/FAU-awarded-2413-million-grant-to-improve-quality-of-life-for-individuals-with-dementia-and-their-families。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=27501a8b-534b-4d61-ac62-ad9c53ed08ce Wed, 20 Sep 2023 14:23:37 -0400 FAU awarded $1.3 million grant to improve quality of life for individuals with dementia and their families
西奈山获得 620 万美元拨款，用于扩建科恩复杂慢性病康复中心西奈山康复和人类表现部宣布史蒂文和亚历山德拉·科恩基金会提供 620 万美元赠款。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/Mount-Sinai-secures-2462-million-grant-to-expand-the-Cohen-Center-for-Recovery-From-Complex-Chronic-Illnesses。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/Mount-Sinai-secures-2462-million-grant-to-expand-the-Cohen-Center-for-Recovery-From-Complex-Chronic-Illnesses。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28d82d18-8783-47bd-b458-e4db2c2b2ed1 Wed, 20 Sep 2023 14:16:52 -0400 Mount Sinai secures $6.2 million grant to expand the Cohen Center for Recovery From Complex Chronic Illnesses
基于纳米技术的病毒感染预防、治疗和诊断策略新出现和反复出现的病毒感染病例对公共卫生构成重大问题和巨大挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/Nanotechnology-based-strategies-for-preventing-treating-and-diagnosing-viral-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/Nanotechnology-based-strategies-for-preventing-treating-and-diagnosing-viral-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b635ac9-d921-4091-af40-311b5a9f7539 Wed, 20 Sep 2023 13:48:48 -0400 Nanotechnology-based strategies for preventing, treating, and diagnosing viral infections
